text: "Unchained Melody" is a 1955 song recorded by Alex North and was recorded for the movie Unchained. It has been covered by numerous artists over the years including The Righteous Brothers in 1965 and was used in the 1990 movie Ghost. It topped the single charts in the United Kingdom, New Zealand, Australia, the Netherlands, Austria and Ireland. ==References== Category:1955 songs Category:1950s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Perry Como songs Category:The Righteous Brothers songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Air Supply songs Category:Heart (band) songs Category:Dick and Dee Dee songs Category:LeAnn Rimes songs Category:Harry Belafonte songs Category:Barry Manilow songs Category:Susan Boyle songs Category:George Benson songs Category:U2 songs Category:Cyndi Lauper songs
title: Unchained Melody
